locations.A Furious Cocktail: can_brew_potions && Fishing Rod && The Nether && Village && available{Bring Home the Beacon}
locations.How Did We Get Here?: can_brew_potions && has_gold_ingots && End City && The Nether && Fishing Rod && Archery && available{Bring Home the Beacon} && available{Hero of the Village}
locations.Arbalistic: craft_crossbow && Piercing IV Book && can_use_anvil && can_enchant
locations.A Balanced Diet: has_bottle && has_gold_ingots && Progressive Resource Crafting, 2 && The End
locations.Cover Me in Debris: Progressive Armor, 2 && 8 Netherite Scrap, 2 && Progressive Resource Crafting && has_diamond_pickaxe && has_iron_ingots && can_brew_potions && Bed
locations.Feels like home: has_iron_ingots && Bucket && Fishing Rod && (fortress_loot || complete_raid) && Saddle
locations.Star Trader: has_iron_ingots && Bucket && (The Nether || Nether Fortress || can_piglin_trade) && overworld_villager

macros.has_gold_ingots: (Progressive Tools, 2 || The Nether) && Progressive Resource Crafting
macros.can_adventure: (setting{combat_difficulty, option_easy} && Progressive Weapons, 2 && has_iron_ingots && death_link_check) || setting{combat_difficulty, option_hard} || (Progressive Weapons && death_link_check && (Progressive Resource Crafting || Campfire))
macros.basic_combat: (setting{combat_difficulty, option_easy} && Progressive Weapons, 2 && Progressive Armor && Shield && has_iron_ingots) || setting{combat_difficulty, option_hard} || (Progressive Weapons && (Progressive Armor || Shield) && has_iron_ingots)
macros.complete_raid: can_reach_raid_regions && ((setting{combat_difficulty, option_easy} && Progressive Weapons, 3 && Progressive Armor, 2 && Shield && Archery && Progressive Tools, 2 && has_iron_ingots) || (setting{combat_difficulty, option_hard} && Progressive Weapons, 2 && has_iron_ingots && (Progressive Armor || Shield)) || (Progressive Weapons, 2 && has_iron_ingots && Progressive Armor && Shield))
macros.can_kill_wither: fortress_loot && ((setting{combat_difficulty, option_easy} && normal_wither_kill && Archery) || (setting{combat_difficulty, option_hard} && (normal_wither_kill || The Nether || The End)) || (normal_wither_kill))
macros.can_respawn_ender_dragon: The Nether && The End && Progressive Resource Crafting
macros.can_kill_ender_dragon: ((setting{combat_difficulty, option_easy} && Progressive Weapons, 3 && Progressive Armor, 2 && Archery && can_brew_potions && can_enchant) || (setting{combat_difficulty, option_hard} && ((Progressive Weapons, 2 && Progressive Armor) || (Progressive Weapons && Bed))) || (Progressive Weapons, 2 && Progressive Armor && Archery))
macros.has_structure_compass(Overworld Structur: setting{structure_compasses, false} || ((contains{Overworld Structure 1 => Village, Village} && 'Structure Compass (Village)') || (contains{Overworld Structure 1 => Village, Pillager Outpost} && 'Structure Compass (Pillager Outpost)') || (contains{Overworld Structure 1 => Village, Nether Fortress} && 'Structure Compass (Nether Fortress)') || (contains{Overworld Structure 1 => Village, Bastion Remnant} && 'Structure Compass (Bastion Remnant)') || (contains{Overworld Structure 1 => Village, End City} && 'Structure Compass (End City)'))

setting{structure_compasses, false} || ((contains{Overworld Structure 2 => Pillager Outpost, Village} && 'Structure Compass (Village)') || (contains{Overworld Structure 2 => Pillager Outpost, Pillager Outpost} && 'Structure Compass (Pillager Outpost)') || (contains{Overworld Structure 2 => Pillager Outpost, Nether Fortress} && 'Structure Compass (Nether Fortress)') || (contains{Overworld Structure 2 => Pillager Outpost, Bastion Remnant} && 'Structure Compass (Bastion Remnant)') || (contains{Overworld Structure 2 => Pillager Outpost, End City} && 'Structure Compass (End City)'))
macros.has_structure_compass(Nether Structure 1: setting{structure_compasses, false} || ((contains{Nether Structure 1 => Nether Fortress, Village} && 'Structure Compass (Village)') || (contains{Nether Structure 1 => Nether Fortress, Pillager Outpost} && 'Structure Compass (Pillager Outpost)') || (contains{Nether Structure 1 => Nether Fortress, Nether Fortress} && 'Structure Compass (Nether Fortress)') || (contains{Nether Structure 1 => Nether Fortress, Bastion Remnant} && 'Structure Compass (Bastion Remnant)') || (contains{Nether Structure 1 => Nether Fortress, End City} && 'Structure Compass (End City)'))
macros.has_structure_compass(Nether Structure 2: setting{structure_compasses, false} || ((contains{Nether Structure 2 => Bastion Remnant, Village} && 'Structure Compass (Village)') || (contains{Nether Structure 2 => Bastion Remnant, Pillager Outpost} && 'Structure Compass (Pillager Outpost)') || (contains{Nether Structure 2 => Bastion Remnant, Nether Fortress} && 'Structure Compass (Nether Fortress)') || (contains{Nether Structure 2 => Bastion Remnant, Bastion Remnant} && 'Structure Compass (Bastion Remnant)') || (contains{Nether Structure 2 => Bastion Remnant, End City} && 'Structure Compass (End City)'))
macros.has_structure_compass(The End Structure): setting{structure_compasses, false} || ((contains{The End Structure => End City, Village} && 'Structure Compass (Village)') || (contains{The End Structure => End City, Pillager Outpost} && 'Structure Compass (Pillager Outpost)') || (contains{The End Structure => End City, Nether Fortress} && 'Structure Compass (Nether Fortress)') || (contains{The End Structure => End City, Bastion Remnant} && 'Structure Compass (Bastion Remnant)') || (contains{The End Structure => End City, End City} && 'Structure Compass (End City)'))
macros.village_in_overworld: contains{Overworld Structure 1 => Village, Village} || contains{Overworld Structure 2 => Pillager Outpost, Village}
macros.village_in_nether: contains{Nether Structure 1 => Nether Fortress, Village} || contains{Nether Structure 2 => Bastion Remnant, Village}
macros.village_in_end: contains{The End Structure => End City, Village}
macros.normal_wither_kill: Progressive Weapons, 3 && Progressive Armor, 2 && can_brew_potions && can_enchant
